io.mpos.accessories.payment.listener
Interface PaymentAccessoryUserConfirmationListener

public interface PaymentAccessoryUserConfirmationListener

Listener for the confirmation of a prompt on an accessory

Since:
2.0.0

Success handler for getting a user confirmation

Parameters:

failure

void failure(MposError error)
Failure handler for getting a user confirmation. Will be returned if the request times out.

Parameters:
error - Error that occurred during confirmation
